documents.document:
Kashmir the Most Beautiful and Outstanding State in India

Kashmir the most beautiful state in India is famous throughout the world for its outstanding and everlasting natural beauty, which invites thousands and thousands of tourists from every corner of the world. This beautiful land is blessed with all the essentials of nature such as beautiful lakes, gushing waterfalls, swift flowing rivers, undulating hills, lush green valleys and lots more. This heavenly land is also blessed with many interesting and eye catching tourists’ places which will surely be liked and admired by the tourists. It is a very beautiful place for those tourists and the visitors who want to escape from the blazing heat of the sun in the plains.
Srinagar which is known as the city of lakes is located in the western part of state of Jammu and Kashmir. It is the summer capital of the state of Jammu and Kashmir and is visited by horde of tourists from across the world. It is the pride of the beautiful valleys of Kashmir as it offers the tourists and the visitors with beautiful and picturesque lakes which fill the tourists with awe and surprise, the water of these lakes is crystal clear and blue in appearance. The mighty Himalayas, the calm lakes, beautiful houseboats and Shikaras, majestic Mughal architecture, undulating hills, lush green valley’s are the main attraction of this heavenly place. The best time to visit this heavenly land is during summer in the month of June to early November. Srinagar tour provides the tourists with all the beautiful elements of nature which will surely mesmerize the tourists and leave them spell bound. Tour to Srinagar also provides the tourists with adventure sports which will surely fills the tourists and the visitors with vigor and energy.
Kashmir is the most beautiful place to visit on earth as it is blessed with awesome natural beauty and the finest tourists’ attraction among which the houseboats are the most important and the famous attraction of this heavenly place. Trip to Kashmir offers the tourists with exciting and thrilling stay which is as luxurious and comfortable as the stay in the hotels and resorts. It also offers the tourists with new experience which will surely be liked and admired by the tourists. These houseboats are equipped with all the modern and essential equipments so that the tourists can enjoy their holiday with lots of fun and excitement. The tourists can also opt for houseboat packages which will provide the tourists with all the information regarding the houseboat stay and the tour.
Ladakh is a very beautiful and grand place to visit as it is considered to be the most beautiful and enchanting mountainous region in the whole world. Kashmir tour packages provides the tourists with beautiful and mighty mountain which is covered with white snow and makes is look awesome which cannot be found anywhere else in the world. Here the tourists can see the awesome view of the open sky and the land which seems to meet each other. It also offers the tourists to visit the beautiful and colorful monasteries which are where the visitors can find peace and tranquility and can relax their mind.

Kashmir – Land where magnificence reciprocates naturally

Jammu and Kashmir is a northern Himalayan state in India. It is also called as the heaven on earth. It mainly consists of three parts Jammu, Ladakh and the Kashmir valley. Jammu is the capital in winter and Srinagar is the summer capital. Srinagar is famous for its houseboats in the Dal Lake and Ladakh is also known as little Tibet and attracts a lot of tourists due to its beautiful mountains and the provisions for trekking.
The main and important attraction in Jammu is the houseboats in Dal Lake. Dal Lake is the second largest lake in Jammu and Kashmir. It is 8km long and has a width of 4km. It is spread over an area of 26 square kilometers. You can see some islands in the western part of the lake. Cultivation on floating gardens is also prominent in these parts which are very beautiful to watch. The Dal Lake is partedinto two smaller ones namely Lokut and Bod Dal. The history of house boats starts from the time of British Raj. The people in Jammu and Kashmir chose house boats as their home after they have been denied their land grants. Thus house boats are closely related with the traditions and culture of this place. You can enjoy your stay and ride in these luxurious house boats through the lovely Dal Lake. You can explore the exotic beauty of the Dal Lake by taking a ride in these house boats. All the house boats are spacious and are well decorated in the interiors providing you with a luxurious and comfortable ride. The house boats are made of cedar wood. Every house boats are built with one or two bedrooms at least one of them will be attached and also dining area, balcony, deck, and a fully furnished kitchen. Usually there are also services such as internet, telephones, televisions and a doctor on call. In house boats you are served with all kind of delicious foods. A cook and a care taker will be there in the house boats. They take care of the tourists 24 hours during you stay. A small paddle boat is attached to all house boats which can take you to the shore any time or you can simply sight see in that boat. In short you won’t feel you are away from home yet you could see and feel the beauty of the Dal Lake.
Another main location in Jammu and Kashmir is Ladakh. For those who love adventurous sports Ladakh is the right place. Trekking in Ladakh is very famous and attracts a lot of tourists. The best season to go for trekking in Ladakh is between the months of July and September. The trekking here is set up between the Himalayan and Karakoram mountain ranges. It is truly a marvelous experience to trek in the world’s largest mountain ranges. Our tour package can take care of the essential matters to enjoy the grace of this blessed place to the fullest.

For more information visit www.kashmirhouseboats.org.in/tour-packages.html

Make Your Vacations an Ecstatic Experience in Kashmir

A heaven for honeymooners, holiday seekers, adventure-thrillers and nature-lovers, Kashmir is really one of the beautiful places to explore at least once in a lifetime span. Home to rich natural virgin attractions and soothing climatic conditions, it is one such place whose significance and splendour is just beyond the words and visual delight. Due to its immense beauty and delightful ambiance it gathers large number of visitors from across the world, all the year round. Often referred to as the ‘paradise on earth’, this world famous destination lies in northern part of India.

Whatever you are looking for, whether you are honeymooning with your beloved, enjoy a gap year, holidaying with family or simply wish to spend your vacations in the lap of mother-nature, you will certainly find there is always something thrilling to do here. Every year people from different parts of the world visit this state and come back with several memorable holidaying experiences that they can cherish for the lifetime. Tour packages to Kashmir will provide you the most unique experience in the entire world along with the splendid nature.

Picturesque landscapes, snow-laden peaks, refreshing hills, blossoming gardens, peaceful lakes, meandering rivers, apple laden orchards and ranges of floras and faunas make this state not less than paradise on earth. Along with its natural attractions it is equally popular for its warm-friendly people, mouth-watering cuisine, colourful fests and excellent hotels facilities. People who are planning to spend their vacations in the lap of mother-nature really not needed any accommodation for staying but you will glad to know that there are so many places in Kashmir and all are well settled with excellent hotels and accommodations that cater almost every facility to the visitors.

Though there are many interesting things and activities that one can experience in Kashmir but to perform or explore all of them within very limited time is however not possible. Mughal Garden tour, houseboat cruise in stunning Dal Lake, hill stations tour, and adventure are the few popular tours that every one should experience on their visit to this state. Kashmir houseboats along the Dal Lake truly is the retreat to the vacationers where they enjoy the pristine beauty of nature and leisure.

Well if you wish to spend your vacations away from hustle bustle of life then must visit to Sonamarg a stunning hill station situated at a height of 2740 m. due to the aromatic flowers that wraps the meadow in the spring it is often referred to as the ‘Meadow of Gold’. Home to natural virgin attractions and snowy mountains it is the main base for the treks that passes along several mountain lakes like the Vishansar, Kishansar, Gadsar, Satsar, and Gangabal. Apart from there are many other attractions that one can explore through Kashmir tour such as Pahalgam, Srinagar, Jammu, and the beautiful region Ladakh.

Well if you love adventure and wish to indulge in several fun-filled activities like white-water rafting, trekking, mountain-biking, paragliding, peak-climbing and etc then must visit to this stunning place. Trip to Kashmir truly is enjoyed by all sorts of vacationer from every alcove and bend of the world throughout the entire year.

For reading more about kashmir you can visit here http://www.alivenotdead.com/vaigavenugopal/Kashmir-the-Most-Beautiful-and-Outstanding-State-in-India-profile-2284308.html

Modern and Traditional Mix Travel Kerala Houseboats

The backwater is one of the major tourism happening region of Kerala. It is one of the best tourist spot of Kerala which will give you the right access to experiences the overall attraction and wonders of the state. It is one among the wonders of the world.
The backwater is unique feature of Kerala. There is lots of lake and backwaters sprawling in the world and even the houseboat services are quite common in almost all the lake tourist attraction sites. But still the backwater of Kerala remains to be a mystery and a unique exemplary attraction in tourism world and there is none other synonymous with this backwater in either of neither its service nor the significant features.
It is a long stretch of waterways formed by joining up all the small canals and lagoons found within the state feed by some rivers flowing down from the Western Ghats creates beautiful narrow canals of lake. This long stretch of water bodies connect almost every nook and corners of the state to escaped into the Sea through the Cochin port. Tracing back to the ancient days before the civilization took place in the state; this backwater has serves as the sole interest of the people. Transport services are provided; day to day earning bases of livelihood are given and have slowly lead to progress and civilization by this backwater. Thus this backwater has been the friend and help for the state for quite a long time back and so if you are seeking to know about the state’s culture and historical development stories, you are sure to get from its tour.
The houseboats conducted by tourism in this Kerala Backwater will give you a wonderful opportunity to see both the present and the past stories of the state. This houseboat which is used as a travel means for touring purpose was once an ordinary traditional boat use in the backwater for transport of goods and people to the town and cities. The houseboat which is used at present for sightseeing and touring purpose is a modified form of houseboat which cozy living rooms and luxury materials for leisure stay on the backwater but are made by ordinary and simply made with wood and coconut robe but made with intricate design, well furnished to give the best elegant glow that attracts the tourist.
Today, you will find different types of houseboats in Kerala all with each unique attraction may be in comfort or luxury or facilities. These houseboats have become the interest of everyone as it is eco-friendly as well as enjoyable. It takes you to even the most rustic villages of the state, terrific temples, exotic resorts, lush green paddy field sightseeing and other panoramic sights. With its tour you will get to experiences the traditional charm as well as the unparallel beauty of the backwater. Therefore Kerala houseboat tourism remain unbeatable and unmatchable by any other tourist destinations of the world.

I have posted my another experience in this article http://vaigavenugopal.buzznet.com/user/journal/17264164/beauty-boat-races-kerala-backwaters

Kashmir the Ultimate Place to Go for Nature Tour

Kashmir the glory of India located in North India is the dream destination of the many couples and nature lovers. It is the blessed land with serenity, greenery, holiness, adventure and more importantly the nature have left all its expression in different forms in Kashmir. So it is the perfect gateway to enjoy delightful and memorable vacation exploring the beauty of the nature and serenity of the outstanding tour places that are located in different regions of Kashmir.

The state of Kashmir is long being the favourite of the thousands and hundreds and so is the reason, every year millions of tourists during the winter as well as during the summer season flock here to submit to the glory of nature. To be very true it is the destination of all season and one can visit this state to any time to enjoy the vacation with lots of glory, joy and happiness.

Well in recent time there is quite disturbances in Kashmir due to some political dis-balance. But the enough security for the tourist have still kept inflow of the number and is increasing very year. Some of the exquisite places that one can visit during Kashmir tours are Pahalgam, Srinagar, Katra, Vaishno Devi, Jammu, Sonamarg and Gulmarg. These are some exquisite places that invite visitors from across the globe to enjoy delightful kashmir trip.

Some of the exciting and alluring places of interest that one can visit during the tour are

Gulmarg
Gulmarg is an exciting tour and hill resort. The place is very popular for its inviting natural beauty and some exquisite attractions. Some of the interesting attractions that one can visit during Gulmarg tour are Alpather Lake, Baba Reshi Shrine, Gondola, Cable Car to Kongdor, Gulmarg Gold Golf, Khilanmarg, Maharani Temple, St Marys Church, etc. Apart from these exciting tourist places, one can also enjoy various thrilling adventurous sports that include Skiing and Trekking.

Srinagar
Srinagar the summer capital of Kashmir is home to some exquisite tour and travel places. It is many charming attractions that include the blossoming gardens, pristine lakes, holy shrines and exquisite landscapes endowed in the glory of the nature. Some of the interesting places that one can enjoy and visit during the tour are Pari Mahal, Nishat Bagh, Mughal Gardens, Nasim Bagh, Shalimar Bagh, Hazartabal Shrine, Shankaracharya Temple, etc. These are some of the exquisite places of interest that allure and entice from across the globe to Srinagar.

Apart from that one cannot miss out to visit the Shikara ride over the placid and charming Dal Lake during Srinagar tour. It is one sought place where one can enjoy with maximum joy and happiness and treasure remarkable experience to relish in forever.

Beside these there are many other wonderful places to see and explore during Kashmir packages. So plan the tour with your friends and families booking the tailor made package and explore the appealing beauty of Kashmir with lots of joy and ecstasy.
Come to this beautiful paradise and take back home rewarding experiences to relish in forever.

For more I have posted my another experience in this article kashmirtourpackagesindia.wordpress.com/2012/07/17/kashmir-peace-and-tranquil-ranging-home-of-nature

Andaman and Nicobar the Best Island For Hang Out Purpose

Andaman is an attractive group of archipelago formed by 572 islands and is divided into three major islands as the north Andaman Island, Little Andaman and Middle Andaman and all these islands serves as the prominent tourist stations within the country. Andaman and Nicobar is one of the top rated tourism popular islands of the world and is one of the best known islands of Asia.
The islands of Andaman and Nicobar were once kept aside as the forbidden island for its far off distant location and were not much manipulated by human and so the nature remains untouched and perfect. People less knew that it was a treasure trove place till the British colonize area and the islands were known to the world only after the European took hold of the area for administration purpose by setting up places like cellular jail and other army camps and administrative buildings and almost half of the habitat areas where once occupied by the British.
The place like Cellular jail in Andaman is one among the top tourist frequented and popular tourist attractions of this destination. This cellular Jail in Port Blair is presently reversed shrines dedicated to great Indian freedom fighters who have laid down their lives for the freedom of the country are been honored as the memorial monuments for them. The original jail contains seven regions with the central region having a tower with four floors with first three floors for cells and the fourth floor is keep in function as the watch tower for tourist to come and admire the wonders of the place and at the same time enjoy the glimpse of mind blowing scenery of water adorn evergreen land area.
There are also numerous other places to see to explore them visit the top tourist fascinating islands such as Havelock and Neil islands are listed among the most popular tourist sought after islands as these islands possess numerous beaches, marine entertainment sites and other places to visit.
The islands of Havelock offer scuba diving, snorkeling and other marine activities for travelers to escape and shake off the dullness and enjoy some frisky mesmerizing days out here. There are still more active and worth visiting islands in this little paradise isolated and reserve island. It was once a reserve island country but know it is known worldwide as one of the best niche for vacation and weekend holiday escape. Theislands of Andaman and Nicobar are charming as well as heart delighting; they offer countless opportunity with mix attraction for both holiday fun seekers and lonely hunters. Once you get drench by its spell and wonders your mind will remain here forever and never again you will forget about its memory, its memories will linger for lifetime and so it is also quite popular among honeymooners and fan by almost all the couples who have experience its travel.

Houseboats and Backwaters in Kerala a Unique Experience

If you wish to explore the backwaters of Kerala, Kerala houseboats are absolutely the ideal advantage for you. If you are in the houseboat, you would be able to adore the arresting lagoons, lakes, canals and rivers here. In fact, if you appoint a houseboat, you can apprehend to see the backwaters in its best form. This is absolutely actual relaxing, by agency of which you can analyze the adorableness here, as well. However, afore you appointment here, it is capital that you get an able advice of the houseboats, so that you do not face any problem, while you are here.
Kerala Backwaters are one of the different attractions in Kerala, an alternation of canals extending about 1500 kms, with an arrangement of 44 rivers, lagoons and lakes. Most of the Kerala backwater is by itself formed and some of the abjure canals are manmade. Canals are adapted for connected cartage of men and materials. Before the avant-garde carriage methods like alley and air carriage became popular, the capital burden bus line in Kerala was through backwaters by 'Kettuvallams'.
The Kerala houseboat cruise takes you to addition world, with attributes at its best, advancing to Kerala and not experiencing the amplitude of these affluence amphibian castles will be arduous waste. The best abode to be explored in these comfortable houseboats has consistently been the abstruse Kumarakom. The houseboats here accept admiring affluence of tourists from beyond the world and thus it is the most splendid way to explore the kumarakom tourist attractions.
Kumarakom has an advanced array of houseboats. They are acclimated alone for tourists these days. An abstracted baiter accepted as Kettuvallam is acclimated by the humans to go fishing or to carriage goods. Apart from these, there are affected appropriate boats like Kochu-odi Vallam, Odi-Vallam, Iruttukutthi Vallam, Churulan Vallam and Chundan Vallam (Snake Boat), which yield allotment in the baiter contest during Onam time. The boat race in Kumarakom is conducted in the big aqueduct in the centre abreast the market. There is a clandestine sailing club in Kumarakom, amid on the bank of the Vembanad Lake.
House boats in Alleppey is the best way to analyze the abjure lakes, lagoons, rivers, aqueduct systems and accustomed adorableness of backwaters of kerala. It is absolutely an abundant acquaintance to adore the adorableness of the backwaters of Kerala by traveling in kerala abode boat. The baptize means of the houseboats in Kerala are banked by the greenery and is anon alluring tourists from all locations of the world. Coconut endowed rivers Alleppey home stay and Alleppey houseboats offers admirable kerala houseboat tours as on with any Kerala tour packages.
The better abjure amplitude in Kerala is the Vembanad Basin which flows through three districts and opens out into the sea at the Kochi Port. The Ashtamudi Lake, actually accepting eight arms, which covers an above allocation of Kollam commune in the south, is the additional better and is advised the aperture to the backwaters. Thus contact a leading Kerala tour operator and enjoy the most beautiful and amazing backwaters along cruising in the well organized houseboats.

Alluring Tourist Attractions to Explore In Heaven of India

If you are seeking some coolest and heart grabbing destination in India, then Kashmir will end your search. Kashmir travel agents offer you a fabulous tour package where you can fulfill your all dreams by exploring your dream vacation. Kashmir welcomes all sorts of visitors to visit here and enjoy its incredible and awe inspiring beauty of nature. It is located in northwest of India and truly is nothing less than a paradise on earth. Many people attracts with its virgin beauty which tempts them to visit this scenic place again and again. This destination has abundance attractions include sky touching peaks, snow capped mountains, rivers, incredible greenery, scenic natural beauty and much more. This destination is also offers nature lovers and adventure enthusiast’s wonderful opportunities which easily grab their heart and head.

Kashmir is truly the crowning glory of India and truly it draws intense number of vacationers from all over the globe.

Dal Lake
Dal Lake is the gem of Srinagar and truly visited and explored by all the vacationers who come to explore the enthralling Kashmir with any Kashmir holiday packages. This lake is largest lake in Srinagar and is known as jewel of Srinagar. It is one of the best destinations which is situated in the heart of Srinagar and is heavenly blessed by the nature. The excellent and beautiful houseboats, flowers, water plants. The sprawling green hills which endows the lush this picturesque Dal Lake easily enhance the beauty. The Shalimar Bagh and Nishat Bagh are famous and historical gardens of Dal Lake. There are some attractions nearby Dal Lake like Shankaracharya Temple, the Chashme Shahi, the Nagin Lake and the Hari Parbat. Many tourists visit here during summer and also considered as summer resort. Honeymooners in this state with any Kashmir honeymoon packages never miss the opportunity to explore the splendid beauty of Dal Lake cruising over the charming houseboats.

Amarnath Yatra
Amarnath temple is pilgrim’s temple in India is located at height of 3,880 meters and is about 145 km far from Srinagar. Lord Shiva is known for many names and Amarnath is also one of them. Considered by Hindu, this holy cave is most holy temple in India and this holy temple dedicated to Lord Amarnath. The journey of this holy cave is known as Amarnath Yatra. Amarnath Yatra have toughest route trek and faint hearted cannot be done. This Yatra began month of Sharavan (beginning of July to the end by August).

Pahalgam
Pahalgam is at height of 7200 feet from the sea level and is 95 kms far from Srinagar. It is most popular hill resorts in Kashmir. Many tourists love to visit here. This place is famous for the base camp of Amarnath Yatra. This place captured your heart because of its snow capped mountains, green trees and pleasant climate. You can also enjoy here skiing, treks and camping and apart from that there are some main attractions include Tulian Lake, Pahalgam River and Sheshnag Lake. Pahalgam is one of the major tourist destination to visit explore on your Kashmir tours.

Apart from these attractions there are some religious places like Vaishno Devi Temple, Nagbani, Panchbakhter temple and Ranabireshwar Temple which can be visited and explored with Kashmir tour packages. Kashmir truly will offer you charming spurt on your on your visit.

Andaman - Floating in splendid isolation

Andaman and Nicobar Islands float in splendid isolation away from Indian mainland. Although away, it is part of India. Andaman and Nicobar Islands is an archipelago of five hundred and seventy two verdant islands, islets and rocks. Out of these, only thirty six are inhabited. The topography of the islands is hilly and major part is covered by evergreen forests. The islands are home to endless variety of exotic flowers and birds. The sandy beaches that dot the elongated coast line are fringed by swaying coconut trees. Rare flora and fauna, underwater marine life and coral reeves, crystal clear water, creeks lined by mangroves and opportunities for water sports – the bounties of nature Andaman and Nicobar islands are blessed with are such.
Andaman Tourism is a dream for nature lover for it has fresh unpolluted air, clean and wide roads, free of filth and also rare gifts of nature. Also the sea around the island is especially conducive for water sports. There are also provisions for adventure activities like trekking, island camping, snorkeling and scuba diving etc.
Tourism in Andaman is centered around its islands. The prominent of islands are Jolly Buoy, Cinque Island, Red Skin Island, Havelock Island, Barren Island, Ross Island, Viper Island and Chatham Island.
Jolly Buoy is an island which is part of Mahatma Gandhi Marine National Park. Its sea is apt for bathing and beach ideal for sunbathing. Snorkeling can be tried here and island offers a breath taking underwater view of coral and marine life.
Cinque Island is superb place for scuba diving, swimming, fishing and camping. It has excellent underwater coral gardens. The attraction of unspoiled beaches especially a sand bar joining two islands is irresistible.
Red Skin Island is another one which is part of Mahatma Gandhi Marine National Park. It homes a nice beach and offers a spectacular view of corals and marine life.
Havelock Island exists near Port Blair, the capital of Andaman and Nicobar Islands. The island provides for an idyllic resort in the lap of a pristine beach and boasts of unpolluted environment. Camping facility is available near Radhangar Beach.
Barren Island is the land of volcano. It is the only active volcano in India . About half a kilometer away from the shore, a big crater of volcano rises abruptly from the sea. Andaman tour operators will arrange for visit to Barren Island on board vessels.
Ross Island was the capital of Andaman and Nicobar Islands during British raj. Now the old structures are almost in ruins. There is a small museum exhibiting photographs and antiques of British era.
Viper Island is the place where Britishers used to harbor convicts. The first jail was built here, which was abandoned after the construction of Cellular jail. There is a gallows atop a hillock, where condemned prisoners were hanged.
Chatham Island homes the main mainland- island harbor. In a tiny island connected by a bridge built over sea water, there is a Saw Mill. This Saw Mill is one of the biggest and oldest in Asia.
The main tourist places in Andaman and Nicobar islands are Neil Island, Cong Island, Rangat, Mayabunder, Diglipur, Little Andaman Island, Car Nicobar, Katchal, Great Nicobar, Mahtma Gandhi Marine National Park, Gandhi Park, Sippighat farm, Chiddiya Tapu, Collinpur, Madhubhan, Mount Harriet and a mini zoo in Port Blair.

Kashmir: The Jewel Crown on the Map of India

Kashmir, the paradise on earth is known for is magnificent snow-capped mountains, landscape gardens and the romantic houseboats, which will give you a wonderful life time experience. Among the tourists attraction you will come across the several religious place that are located in Jammu which is scenic as well as peaceful. Your trip to Kashmir is in complete without the visit to the shrine of the goddess Vaishno Devi, which is considered to be a pilgrimage for the Hindus.
There are many interesting places for the tourists to visit in Kashmir, the most important being the Gulmarg. Gulmarg is not merely a mountain resort with exceptional beauty but also has the highest green golf course in the world at the altitude of 2,650m and the country’s premier ski in winter. Depending on the seasons the nature colors could be the translucent green of spring, rich emerald summers, or autumn’s golden hue. The climb to Gulmarg begins through fir-covered hills. At one point generally known as the View point, travelers often stop their vehicles to look out the spectacle of the snow covered mountain almost within touching distance. Pahalgam the valley of shepherds is another outstanding visiting place in Kashmir. It is a premier resort cool even during the heights of summer where the maximum temperature does not exceeds 250c.The resort is set between a fairly steep hills, so it is better to hire a pony rather than walking. The most beautiful of this is the huge undulating meadow of Bairsaran, surrounded by thick forest of pine. Hajan on the way to Chandanwari is an idyllic spot for picnic. Sonamarg, the meadow of the gold is the base of the major trek that passes along several mountain lakes-Sadsar, Gadsar, Vishansar, Kishansar and Gangabal. Sonamarg is also the take off station for the drive to Ladakh. Amarnath is considered to be very sacred place for the Hindus. Every year many Hindus disciples come to visit Amarnath. Amarnath Yatra is held every year in the month of August. Legend has it that Shiva recounted to Parvati the secret of creation in a cave in Amarnath.
Holidays in Kashmir is awe-struck experience to the visitors. The holidays in charming Kashmir is such that one will always remember. A visit to the Shankaracharya Hills and Mughal Garden will rejuvenate our souls. Romancing in the stunning meadows of Gulmarg, ride on a pony with our beloved once or simple stare at the majestic mountains will make us feel in heaven. Holidays in Kashmir will give you a quiet environment and memorable too.
With the beautiful snow peak mountains Kashmir valley is one of the most beautiful and romantic destinations in India. Beautiful white snow peaks, green meadow, valleys and calm lakes makes Kashmir the preferred location for romantic honeymoon. A honeymoon in Kashmir lets you enjoy the thrill of experiencing the “paradise on earth” and makes your new journey of life more delightful and perfect. There cannot be more perfect honeymoon place in India than Kashmir to begin your new life in angelic beauty of the nature, tempting to fall in love with it at first sight. A Honeymoon in Kashmir will make those moments that you will cherish all your life.

Kashmir A Master Piece Creation on Earth

Set on the crown of the Indian map lies the paradise called Kashmir which is commonly known for its heavenly places, houseboats, best experience in every season and its majestic mountains. Its gives an extravagant beautiful scenic charm to the tourists. The Kashmir valley region is famous for its picturesque natural beauty and the Dal Lake that reflects the surroundings snow capped peaks. A tour to Kashmir is the gateway to the nature lovers and its breezy environment is such that it will make you feel in heaven.
Kashmir tour helps to relive your life again and add spice to it. It is the most preferred destinations which invite not only the nature lovers or honeymooners but it is perfect destination for all kinds of vacations where visitors can enjoy fully with their loved ones. The Kashmir tour package comes in various categories fitting perfectly in every pocket. It also helps you to enjoy and explore much more than your expectations as the place is blesses with exotic beauty and scenic charm. Also known as the paradise on earth, Kashmir blossoming gardens, its beautiful landscape, magnificent mountains, silent waterfalls, fine orchids, revered temples makes it a most beautiful and interesting place to visit in India. It takes you to the enchanting world of angelic beauty. Tour packages in Kashmir have an important destination like Gulmarg, Pahalgam, Srinagar, Katra, Leh, Ladakh, Kashmir valley etc. The nearest airport to reach Kashmir is in Srinagar. The nearest rail head is the Jammu Tawi. It is 305km away from Srinagar.
Trip to Kashmir will take you to its splendid land where one can enjoy life in close interaction with the nature and mountains. For the religious people there is a divine land, the caves of Amarnath which is quite difficult to reach. Every year many Hindus visit here from all over the world as it is a pilgrimage for them. The trip to Kashmir valley which is also known as the “Switzerland of Asia” is a destination which will mesmerize your senses with its stunning surroundings. Shikara ride on the Dal Lake will take you to the wonder land of Jammu and Kashmir also covering destination of Pahalgam, Gulmarg, Patnitop and Srinagar.
Kashmir is a land with a vast expanse of legendry lakes that are woven with intricate network of canals and backwaters, which famously makes it known as the houseboat capital of India. In houseboats you can relax and unwind yourselves. The houseboats are located far from the madding crowd so that there is peace in the minds of the visitors. Ultra modern houseboats will provide you an opportunity to rediscover yourself and enjoy the royal treats that can make your visit to Kashmir a memorable moment. The engrossing beauty of the nature viewed from the Houseboat is truly heavenly and engulfs the heart of the tourists. Kashmir Houseboat tour offers warm hospitality, well maintained services, cultural heritage that brings a life time experience. The Srinagar houseboats are the noblest way to stay and experience the most memorable holiday which is beyond imagination. A Trip to Kashmir is incomplete without the stay at houseboats.

Explore Goa and get familiar with its mesmerizing attraction

Whenever a person get stressed down with the hectic life shedule then he plans for holidays and look for an exotic holidaying spot where he can take his family and lovable ones. Well there are so many attraction places world-wide having their distinctive features but if you are looking for best holidaying destination in India then look no further than Goa, undoubtedly one of the most sought after tourist destination locate at south-western part of India. Lovingly called ‘Queen of Beaches’, Goa is the beach capital of India bestowed with innumerable beaches offer a great holidaying experience to the visitors. Well there are so many beaches in this state and all are extremely beautiful but apart from beaches there are so many attractions that really deserve the attention such as lush tropical greenery, wildlife parks, turquoise blue water and ranges of floras and faunas.

It is one such state which is only meant to the tourism purposes as it always engaged with different tourist’s activities all the year round. Being a small island place it has so many things to offer which will certainly spoiled your for choices. Andaman and Nicobar islands is basically a union territory of India, with Port Blair is its capital. It is situated in the Indian Ocean, and boasts over 570 islands, out of which only 38 are permanently inhabited. This place has got popularity with the British rule in India when Britishers used this place as an isolated prison for the fighters of Indian Independence, but now these ‘Emerald Islands’ are a famous tourist destination encourage tourists to visit there are least once in a lifetime span.

There are several islands in this place; all are extremely beautiful and worth-visiting. Some of the Andaman Islands are hilly in places, encircled with tropical jungle and with flat stretches of beaches. Rich tropical greenery, long stretches beaches, turquoise blue water, lush greenery and moderate climatic conditions enhances the popularity of the islands and tempts large number of tourists every year. Whether you are visiting with adventure purpose and either planning for honeymoon, there would not be any finest places to get in than this exotic island place. Andaman simply speaking is a treasure trove islands filled with perfect natural ecosystem of peace and tranquility with perfect settings of landscape surrounding it. It is a land of sheer wonderments that are beyond visual and verbal descriptions. Try for a tour experience in its islands attraction sites where Andaman tourism are vibrant, you will yourself floating elsewhere out of the world completely different from your hometown. The pleasure that get here is completely different from the pleasure and happiness that you have come across in other tourist places of the world. A visit to it will help you experience and learn the true bond of nature with humanity and its effect.
These islands are formed by 550 islands among them 26 of them are inhabited by human and others are simply left undiscovered by many due to its distance and unfavorable transport and living purpose. Most of the islands found here are filled with islets and rocks but still they are the ones that add to the beauty and charm of the place. Those islands found in the some typical regions of the north Andaman, Middle Andaman, South Andaman, Little Andaman and Bharatang are quite vast and have a great expanse of lands. Most of these areas are quite fertile and also supports rapid growth of vegetations and thus most of them are thriving with lusting greeneries which appears extremely mind blowing and stimulating to sight.
Furthermore, if you climb up in a little higher summit the vast expanse of sea coast along with sprawling islands dotted on its sea bed are eye catching and simply incredible to experience it. Not only this, the place also carries lots of legacy of many historically important events and location. For historical sightseeing, cultural expedition, and adventurous activities it will be more of help if you get some advice and support from Andaman travel Agents.
